info.description:
The Babylon Staking API offers information about the state of the Babylon BTC Staking system.
Your access and use is governed by the API Access License linked to below.
info.title: Babylon Staking API

get.description: Health check the service, including ping database connection
[DEPRECATED] Retrieves a delegation by a given transaction hash. Please use /v2/delegation instead.

parameters.description: Staking transaction hash in hex format
parameters.name: staking_tx_hash_hex

get.description: [DEPRECATED] Fetches details of all active finality providers sorted by their active total value locked (ActiveTvl) in descending order. Please use /v2/finality-providers instead.

parameters.description: Public key of the finality provider to fetch
parameters.name: fp_btc_pk

parameters.description: Pagination key to fetch the next page of finality providers
parameters.name: pagination_key

200.description: A list of finality providers sorted by ActiveTvl in descending order

get.description: [DEPRECATED] Retrieves the global parameters for Babylon, including finality provider details. Please use /v2/network-info instead.

Check if a staker has an active delegation by the staker BTC address (Taproot or Native Segwit).
Optionally, you can provide a timeframe to check if the delegation is active within the provided timeframe
The available timeframe is "today" which checks after UTC 12AM of the current day

parameters.description: Staker BTC address in Taproot/Native Segwit format
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Check if the delegation is active within the provided timeframe
parameters.name: timeframe

get.description:
Retrieves phase-1 delegations for a given staker. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.
This endpoint is only used to show legacy phase-1 delegations for the purpose of unbonding or registering into phase-2.

parameters.description: Only return delegations with pending actions which include active, unbonding, unbonding_requested, unbonded
parameters.name: pending_action

parameters.description: Pagination key to fetch the next page of delegations
parameters.name: pagination_key

200.description: List of delegations and pagination token

get.description:
Retrieves public keys for the given BTC addresses. This endpoint
only returns public keys for addresses that have associated delegations in
the system. If an address has no associated delegation, it will not be
included in the response. Supports both Taproot and Native Segwit addresses.

parameters.description: List of BTC addresses to look up (up to 10), currently only supports Taproot and Native Segwit addresses
parameters.name: address

200.description: A map of BTC addresses to their corresponding public keys (only addresses with delegations are returned)

get.description: [DEPRECATED] Fetches overall stats for babylon staking including tvl, total delegations, active tvl, active delegations and total stakers. Please use /v2/stats instead.

[DEPRECATED] Fetches staker stats for babylon staking including tvl, total delegations, active tvl and active delegations. Please use /v2/staker/stats instead.
If staker_btc_pk query parameter is provided, it will return stats for the specific staker.
Otherwise, it will return the top stakers ranked by active tvl.

parameters.description: Public key of the staker to fetch
parameters.name: staker_btc_pk

parameters.description: Pagination key to fetch the next page of top stakers
parameters.name: pagination_key

200.description: List of top stakers by active tvl

post.description:
Unbonds a phase-1 delegation by processing the provided transaction details. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.
This is an async operation.

202.description: Request accepted and will be processed asynchronously

get.description: Checks if a delegation identified by its staking transaction hash is eligible for unbonding. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.

200.description: The delegation is eligible for unbonding

get.description: Retrieves a delegation by a given transaction hash

parameters.description: Staking transaction hash in hex format
parameters.name: staking_tx_hash_hex

get.description: Fetches delegations for babylon staking including tvl, total delegations, active tvl, active delegations and total stakers.

parameters.description: Staker public key in hex format
parameters.name: staker_pk_hex

parameters.description: Pagination key to fetch the next page of delegations
parameters.name: pagination_key

200.description: List of staker delegations and pagination token

get.description: Fetches finality providers with its stats, currently does not support pagination

200.description: List of finality providers with its stats

get.description: Get network info, including staking status and param
Get latest prices for all available symbols
Fetches staker stats for babylon staking including active tvl and active delegations.

parameters.description: Public key of the staker to fetch
parameters.name: staker_pk_hex
